name: Rajat Subhra Chakraborty
content: Rajat Subhra ChakrabortySearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationRajat Subhra ChakrabortyI am a Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur (IIT Kharagpur), the oldest IIT and one of the most prestigious academic institutions in India, where I have been working since 2010.  Currently, I am also Associate Dean of the Faculty of Engineering and Architecture of IIT Kharagpur. I also have professional experience of working at National Semiconductor (Jun. 2005 - Jun. 2006) and Intel (Dec. 2021 - Feb. 2023). My primary areas of research interest are: Hardware Security, Electronic Design Automation, VLSI, and Digital Image Forensics. This website will give you an idea of my research interests, my current sponsored research projects and research collaborators, the students working with me and the courses I teach. Please feel free to contact me by whatever mean you find convenient. I am a Senior Member of IEEE and a Senior Member of ACM.My complete CV is available on request.My IIT Kharagpur webpages is located here.My Google Scholar profile can be found here.My Scopus profile can be found here.My DBLP profile is located here.Books: Available at this link. Thank you for visiting my webpage.Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
